item.title: 20. Lone men of Namibia
item.description: Click on the “yellow men” on the map. There are these beautiful stone sculptures placed around the region.

item.title: index
item.description: Namibia 2026 Expedition CONTENTS1. Getting there2. Program3. Day 1 - Henties to Spitzkoppe4. Day 2 - Spitzkoppe to Brandberg20.

item.title: 1. Getting there
item.description: Route Border duties Pre-requisites Bikes need to be road registered and licenced beyond the Expedition end date.

item.title: 3. Day 1 - Henties to Spitzkoppe
item.description: Up the Umaruru river We will have to confirm the conditions of the riverbeds prior to doing this and other section of the route, but assuming conditions are good, we’ll travel about 80kms inside the Umaruru riverbed, hang right and head down to Spitzkoppe.

item.title: 4. Day 2 - Spitzkoppe to Brandberg
item.description: Back up to the Umaruru river, Uis & White Lady We head back up to the Umaruru river on a different route.
